docs.text: Disbursement Management (DBM) API v1.2 Introduction The purpose of this document is to provide the procedures in using the Disbursement Management (DBM) API. The features and functions covered for disbursements will be as follows: Get Disursement Facilities. Disburse Money. Get Disbursement Status. DBM API (Application Programming Interface) allows integrators to process and handle disbursement requests to partner institutions. Getting Started To integrate, integrator receives credential to connect with the API. Parameter Description Type Authorization Unique identifier of integrator String Secret Issued key used for signing the payload data to create a secure token String Info It is recommended to keep the credentials private and secure, especially the LIVE credentials.
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: The purpose of this document is to provide the procedures in using the Disbursement Management (DBM) API. The features and functions covered for disbursements will be as follows: Get Disursement Facilities. Disburse Money. Get Disbursement Status. DBM API (Application Programming Interface) allows integrators to process and handle disbursement requests to partner institutions.
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: To integrate, integrator receives credential to connect with the API. Parameter Description Type Authorization Unique identifier of integrator String Secret Issued key used for signing the payload data to create a secure token String Info It is recommended to keep the credentials private and secure, especially the LIVE credentials.
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: API Reference This reference section provides in depth integration details. Environments There are two environments: TEST and LIVE Environment URL TEST https://test-api-dbm.tlpe.io LIVE https://api-dbm.tlpe.io Security/Authentication All requests are authenticated against an Authorization header with an access token and IP whitelisting. Transaction Payload Data Parameter Name Required? Description Format merchantReference Required Any issued merchant reference id for reference. Alphanumeric facility Required Generated token from /facility endpoint Alphanumeric reference Required Identifier of the receiver Alphanumeric amount Required Amount to disburse Decimal number email Required Customer's email address. Alphanumeric ifsc Required Refers to Indian Financial System Code, which is an eleven character code assigned by RBI to identify every bank branches uniquely Alphanumeric name Required Customer's name Alphanumeric phone Required Customer's phone number Alphanumeric Response Messages Status code Description Remarks OK.00.00 Disbursement Completed Status for a successful disbursement transaction OK.00.10 Disbursement request successful Status for successful disbursement request Error Messages Status code Description Remarks 401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Integrator will receive this error if an incorrect authorization is provided 404 Not found Invalid Transaction Reference Integrator will receive this error if provided. Reference is invalid. 400 Bad Request Invalid Facility Format Integrator will receive this error if the facility format is incorrect. 422 Unprocessable Entity Empty Request Integrator will receive this error if the required parameters are empty. 422 Unprocessable Entity Amount less than 1 Integrator will receive this error if amount is less than 1.00. ER.02.20 Disbursement Request Failed. Reference does not exist Integrator will receive this error if Reference does not exists
docs.title: API Reference

docs.text: This reference section provides in depth integration details.
docs.title: API Reference

docs.text: There are two environments: TEST and LIVE Environment URL TEST https://test-api-dbm.tlpe.io LIVE https://api-dbm.tlpe.io

docs.text: All requests are authenticated against an Authorization header with an access token and IP whitelisting.

Alphanumeric facility Required Generated token from /facility endpoint Alphanumeric reference Required Identifier of the receiver Alphanumeric amount Required Amount to disburse Decimal number email Required Customer's email address. Alphanumeric ifsc Required Refers to Indian Financial System Code, which is an eleven character code assigned by RBI to identify every bank branches uniquely Alphanumeric name Required Customer's name Alphanumeric phone Required Customer's phone number Alphanumeric

docs.text: Status code Description Remarks OK.00.00 Disbursement Completed Status for a successful disbursement transaction OK.00.10 Disbursement request successful Status for successful disbursement request
docs.title: Response Messages

docs.text: Status code Description Remarks 401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Integrator will receive this error if an incorrect authorization is provided 404 Not found Invalid Transaction Reference Integrator will receive this error if provided. Reference is invalid. 400 Bad Request Invalid Facility Format Integrator will receive this error if the facility format is incorrect. 422 Unprocessable Entity Empty Request Integrator will receive this error if the required parameters are empty. 422 Unprocessable Entity Amount less than 1 Integrator will receive this error if amount is less than 1.00. ER.02.20 Disbursement Request Failed. Reference does not exist Integrator will receive this error if Reference does not exists
docs.title: Error Messages

docs.text: Disburse Money Depending on the disbursement facility to be used, to disburse money, send the request headers and body parameters via POST. POST/disburse Disburse to Cashfree { "data" :{ "merchantReference" : "DBMTEST1512210001" , "facility" : "{jwtString}" , "items" :[ { "reference" : "{accountNumber}" , "amount" : "1.00" } ], "customParameters" :[ { "email" : "amaclead@example.com" , "ifsc" : "{code}" , "name" : "{customerName}" , "phone" : "{customerPhone}" } ] } } See API Reference > Transaction Body Payload Data for a more guided requirement. Request Samples Payload { "data" :{ "merchantReference" : "DBMTEST1512210001" , "facility" : "{jwtString}" , "items" :[ { "reference" : "{accountNumber}" , "amount" : "1.00" } ], "customParameters" :[ { "email" : "amaclead@example.com" , "ifsc" : "{code}" , "name" : "{customerName}" , "phone" : "{customerPhone}" } ] } } cURL curl -X POST "https://test-api-dbm.tlpe.io/disburse" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ -d "{ "payload": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..h3vcN1VhiC-PPTLjRNiDkGwHXw_v8QoYfIH6TUkqTUo" } Responses 200 Successful Response 400 Erroneous Response Response Samples 200 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-13 06:52:37 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/disburse" , "data" : { "transactionReference" : "210613065229SJF9939" , "statusCode" : "OK.00.10" , "statusDescription" : "Disbursement request successful" } } 401 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-13 07:11:19 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/disburse" }
docs.title: Cashfree

docs.text: Common Errors and Solutions This section describes common errors that may be encountered during integration and their respective solutions. Response Structure All error responses contain the following fields in JSON format. Parameter Description Type code Issued credentials for authentication and integration String message Issued credentials for authentication and integration String timestamp Error timestamp String errors Specific error of the response String[] Response 400 400 Bad Request There is an invalid or missing required parameters of the request. Whether it is a URL parameter, header parameter or data parameter. The problem can be diagnosed based from the defined error(s). Response Body { "code" : "ER.01" , "message" : "HTTP Request Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 03:55:06.741" , "errors" : [ "Missing request header 'Authorization' of type String" ] } Solution Fix the error depending on the details of the error field. Response 401 401 Unauthorized The current request is not authorized due to invalid credentials or expired token. Response Body { "code" : "ER.02" , "message" : "Authentication Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 03:57:27.384" , "errors" : [ "Invalid authorization token. Make sure that the token is valid and not altered/modified." ] } Solution Fix the error depending on the details of the error field. Response 405 405 Method Not Allowed Incorrect method for the request. If the API is requesting for a ‘POST’ method, do not use ‘GET’ request or vice versa. Response Body { "code" : "ER.01" , "message" : "HTTP Request Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 04:58:35.611" , "errors" : [ "POST method is not supported. Supported method is 'GET'" ] } Solution Fix the error by selecting the appropriate method for the request. If ‘POST’ is required, then use ‘POST’. Use ‘GET’ if ‘GET’ is required. Response 415 415 Unsupported Media Type Incorrect ‘Content-Type’ header value. Usually, the system supports ‘application/json’ as its primary content type. Make sure that this header is present and is with the correct value based on specifications. Response Body { "code" : "ER.01" , "message" : "HTTP Request Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 05:01:02.615" , "errors" : [ "text/plain media type is not supported. Supported media type is 'application/json'" ] } Solution Fix the error by selecting the appropriate content type for the request. Response 422 422 Unprocessable Entity The current request cannot be processed due to a field error found in payload. Each field should be formatted based from the defined specification. Response Body { "code" : "ER.04" , "message" : "Validation Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 03:58:48.769" , "errors" : [ "accountFName: This field is required." ] } Solution Fix the error depending on the details of the error field. Response 500 500 Internal Server Error An internal system error was encountered upon transaction. This may be due to ongoing system maintenance, a system bug, or a system failure. Response Body { "code" : "ER.06" , "message" : "Internal Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 03:58:48.769" , "errors" : [ "Internal system error encountered. Please retry the transaction or contact the administrator" ] } Solution Retry the current transaction. If still failing after several retries, please contact the administrator for the support.
docs.title: **Common Errors and Solutions**

docs.text: This section describes common errors that may be encountered during integration and their respective solutions.
docs.title: Common Errors and Solutions

docs.text: All error responses contain the following fields in JSON format. Parameter Description Type code Issued credentials for authentication and integration String message Issued credentials for authentication and integration String timestamp Error timestamp String errors Specific error of the response String[]
docs.title: Response Structure

docs.text: 400 Bad Request There is an invalid or missing required parameters of the request. Whether it is a URL parameter, header parameter or data parameter. The problem can be diagnosed based from the defined error(s). Response Body { "code" : "ER.01" , "message" : "HTTP Request Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 03:55:06.741" , "errors" : [ "Missing request header 'Authorization' of type String" ] } Solution Fix the error depending on the details of the error field.
docs.title: Response 400

docs.text: 401 Unauthorized The current request is not authorized due to invalid credentials or expired token. Response Body { "code" : "ER.02" , "message" : "Authentication Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 03:57:27.384" , "errors" : [ "Invalid authorization token. Make sure that the token is valid and not altered/modified." ] } Solution Fix the error depending on the details of the error field.
docs.title: Response 401

docs.text: 405 Method Not Allowed Incorrect method for the request. If the API is requesting for a ‘POST’ method, do not use ‘GET’ request or vice versa. Response Body { "code" : "ER.01" , "message" : "HTTP Request Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 04:58:35.611" , "errors" : [ "POST method is not supported. Supported method is 'GET'" ] } Solution Fix the error by selecting the appropriate method for the request. If ‘POST’ is required, then use ‘POST’. Use ‘GET’ if ‘GET’ is required.
docs.title: Response 405

docs.text: 415 Unsupported Media Type Incorrect ‘Content-Type’ header value. Usually, the system supports ‘application/json’ as its primary content type. Make sure that this header is present and is with the correct value based on specifications. Response Body { "code" : "ER.01" , "message" : "HTTP Request Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 05:01:02.615" , "errors" : [ "text/plain media type is not supported. Supported media type is 'application/json'" ] } Solution Fix the error by selecting the appropriate content type for the request.
docs.title: Response 415

docs.text: 422 Unprocessable Entity The current request cannot be processed due to a field error found in payload. Each field should be formatted based from the defined specification. Response Body { "code" : "ER.04" , "message" : "Validation Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 03:58:48.769" , "errors" : [ "accountFName: This field is required." ] } Solution Fix the error depending on the details of the error field.
docs.title: Response 422

docs.text: 500 Internal Server Error An internal system error was encountered upon transaction. This may be due to ongoing system maintenance, a system bug, or a system failure. Response Body { "code" : "ER.06" , "message" : "Internal Error" , "timestamp" : "2020-02-07 03:58:48.769" , "errors" : [ "Internal system error encountered. Please retry the transaction or contact the administrator" ] } Solution Retry the current transaction. If still failing after several retries, please contact the administrator for the support.
docs.title: Response 500

docs.text: Get Disbursement Facilities An endpoint to get disbursement facilities available for disbursement. To get disbursement facilities, send the following request header parameter via GET. GET/facility?expirable=true Facility Request Samples cURL curl -X GET "https://test-api-dbm.tlpe.io/facility?expirable=true" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ Responses 200 Successful Response Response Samples 200 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-13 06:52:37 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/facility" , "data" : [ { "facility" : "{jwtString}" , "value" : "{facilityName}" , "imageUrl" : "{ImageUrl}" }, { "facility" : "{jwtString}" , "value" : "{facilityName}" , "imageUrl" : "{ImageUrl}" } ] }
docs.title: Get Disbursement Facilities

docs.text: An endpoint to get disbursement facilities available for disbursement. To get disbursement facilities, send the following request header parameter via GET. GET/facility?expirable=true
docs.title: Get Disbursement Facilities

docs.text: cURL curl -X GET "https://test-api-dbm.tlpe.io/facility?expirable=true" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \
docs.title: Request Samples

docs.text: 200 Successful Response
docs.title: Responses

docs.text: 200 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-13 06:52:37 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/facility" , "data" : [ { "facility" : "{jwtString}" , "value" : "{facilityName}" , "imageUrl" : "{ImageUrl}" }, { "facility" : "{jwtString}" , "value" : "{facilityName}" , "imageUrl" : "{ImageUrl}" } ] }
docs.title: Response Samples

docs.text: Get Disbursement Status To get disbursement status from the disbursement facility, send the request headers and body parameters via GET. GET/disburse/status?transactionReference={transactionID} Disbursement Status Request Samples cURL curl -X POST "https://test-api-dbm.tlpe.io/disburse/status?transactionReference=210613135438LDN4101" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ Responses 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response Response Samples 200 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-14 02:33:14 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/disburse" , "data" : { "transactionReference" : "210613135438LDN4101" , "statusCode" : "OK.00.00" , "statusDescription" : "Disbursement completed" , "items" : [ { "reference" : "{accountNumber}" , "amount" : "1" , "status" : "200" , "statusDescription" : "SUCCESS" } ] } } 401 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-14 03:31:03 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/disburse/status" }
docs.title: Get Disbursement Status

docs.text: To get disbursement status from the disbursement facility, send the request headers and body parameters via GET. GET/disburse/status?transactionReference={transactionID}
docs.title: Get Disbursement Status

docs.title: Request Samples

docs.text: 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response

docs.text: 200 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-14 02:33:14 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/disburse" , "data" : { "transactionReference" : "210613135438LDN4101" , "statusCode" : "OK.00.00" , "statusDescription" : "Disbursement completed" , "items" : [ { "reference" : "{accountNumber}" , "amount" : "1" , "status" : "200" , "statusDescription" : "SUCCESS" } ] } } 401 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-14 03:31:03 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/disburse/status" }
docs.title: Response Samples

docs.text: RESTful Endpoints This section describes every endpoint needed to integrate to E-Snapped API. Connect and authenticate to the API Connect and authenticate to the API to be able to commence a single transaction. POST/esws/api/connect Notes Issued authorization token is valid within 60 seconds upon response. Integrator must authenticate first before sending a transaction. Authorization Request Samples cURL curl -X POST "http://test.ws.e-snapped.com/esws/api/connect" -H "accept: application/json" -H "Key: test.esnapped.admin" -H "Secret: Qwerty1#$" -H "Content-Type: application/json" Responses 200 Successful Request 400 Result of missing/invalid header parameters 406 Result of incorrect authentication credentials. Please provide correct key and secret values Response Samples 200 { "code" : "OK.01" , "message" : "Authentication Success" , "timestamp" : "2017-09-11 16:11:13.735" , "token" : "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJBbHRQYXlOZXQgQ29ycCIsImlhdCI6MTUwMzY0MTQ0NiwiZXNrIjoiaUJHSXZLemx6N21EcXNEa1pLVmpiZyUzRCUzRC5lc3BqTEpTcWxDJTJGNGxuJTJGM2t2aSUyQmJGQnclM0QlM0QiLCJlc3AiOiIxdVIxQldGbnpiV2l4Zm1ITm92eUZ3JTNEJTNELmVzN3hjbk04cUJkdDF6NThEMTA1TTlKZyUzRCUzRCJ9.eF28MlgCtcPsK7rgqMD8xoaHysPb0cxgkEGwnOwoKh1" } 400 { "code" : "ER.01" , "message" : "HTTP Request Error" , "timestamp" : "2017-09-11 16:11:13.735" , "errors" : [ "Missing request header ‘secret’ of type String" ] } 406 { "code" : "ER.04" , "message" : "Validation Error" , "timestamp" : "2017-09-11 16:11:13.735" , "errors" : [ "Invalid credentials" ] } Generate Invoice Create invoice to the system that can be sent to the client through email. POST/esws/api/invoice/new Notes All decimal type fields must have 2 decimal places as default (e.g. 1.00 instead of 1 to avoid errors) All calculation results must be rounded up to 2 decimal places. If the tax rate has a value of exactly 0.00, then invoice tax details will not be shown. Generate Invoice Generate Invoice Request Body Request Samples cURL curl -X POST "http://test.ws.e-snapped.com/esws/api/invoice/new?s=true" -H "accept: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJBbHRQYXlOZXQgQ29ycCIsImlhdCI6MTU2NTIyOTM4OSwiZXNrIjoiSVNqYUVRTm9aWEpzenM4Z2lpciUyQmRBJTNEJTNELmVzRXFNd2g5Zk85a0xER0dMc2lraTJzUSUzRCUzRCIsImVzcCI6Ik56UTBOcWxUeks4cmxJblRxbGowWnclM0QlM0QuZXNpRTJkY2NFenE0OGxqNGZ1MGRvRmNRJTNEJTNEIiwiZXhwIjoxNTY1MjMxMTg5fQ.YImubUouh47RZvtEjRJN3g_8wpgSLUhzsrtr_wbV4fg" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{ "accountFName": "Abel", "accountLName": "Maclead", "companyName": "AltPayNet Corp.", "address1": "#88", "address2": "5 Boston Ave"", "cityMunicipality": "Philadelphia", "zip": 19132, "stateProvince": "PA", "countryCode": "US", "email": "amaclead@domain.com", "phone": "+99 999 999-9999", "mobile": "+99 999 999-9999", "items": [ { "order": 1, "item": "Sample item 1", "quantity": 1, "amount": 1000.99, "subTotal": 1000.99 } ], "totalAmount": 1000.99, "taxRate": 12.00, "taxDue": 120.12, "totalAmountDue": 1121.11, "dueDate": "2020-01-01", "currency": "USD", "notes": "Testing this invoice", "timezone": "+0800", "merchantReference": "INV-100001_TEST" }" Payload { "accountFName" : "Abel" , "accountLName" : "Maclead" , "companyName" : "AltPayNet Corp." , "address1" : "#88" , "address2" : "5 Boston Ave" , "cityMunicipality" : "Philadelphia" , "zip" : 19132 , "stateProvince" : "PA" , "countryCode" : "US" , "email" : "amaclead@domain.com" , "phone" : "+99 999 999-9999" , "mobile" : "+99 999 999-9999" , "items" :[ { "order" : 1 , "item" : "Sample item 1" , "quantity" : 1 , "amount" : 1000.99 , "subTotal" : 1000.99 } ], "totalAmount" : 1000.99 , "taxRate" : 12 , "taxDue" : 120.12 , "totalAmountDue" : 1121.11 , "dueDate" : "2020-01-01" , "currency" : "USD" , "notes" : "Testing this invoice" , "timezone" : "+0800" , "merchantReference" : "INV-100001_TEST" } Responses 200 Successful Request 400 Result of missing/invalid URL or header parameter/s 401 Result of invalid authorization token. Token must not be null, not modified, and not expired. 406 Result of missing/invalid request body. Response Samples 200 { "code" : "OK.06.00.011" , "message" : "Invoice generated successfully" , "timestamp" : "2017-09-11 16:11:13.735" } 400 { "code" : "ER.01" , "message" : "HTTP Request Error" , "timestamp" : "2017-09-11 16:11:13.735" , "errors" : [ "Missing request header ‘Authorization’ of type String" ] } 401 { "code" : "ER.02" , "message" : "Authentication Error" , "timestamp" : "2017-09-11 16:11:13.735" , "errors" : [ "Invalid authorization token. Make sure that the token has value and not altered/modified." ] } 406 { "code" : "ER.04" , "message" : "Validation Error" , "timestamp" : "2017-09-11 16:11:13.735" , "errors" : [ "accountFName: This field is required." , "accountLName: Invalid field format. Must be composed of letters, spaces and dots only." , "companyName: This field is required." , "address1: This field is required." , "address2: This field is required." , "cityMunicipality: This field is required." , "stateProvince: This field is required." , "countryCode: This field is required." , "zip: Invalid field format. Minimum of 7 and maximum of 19 characters is allowed." , "totalAmount: This field is required." , "email: Invalid field format. Must be formatted as local-part@domain." , "mobile: Either this or phone field is required." , "phone: Either this or mobile field is required" , "dueDate: This field is required." , "currency: Invalid field format. Must be included in ISO 4217 codes." , "taxRate: Invalid or missing field value. Field ‘taxDue’ is required." , "taxDue: Invalid or missing field value. Field 'totalAmount', 'taxRate' is required and result must be calculated correctly." , "totalAmountDue: Invalid or missing field value. Field 'totalAmount' is required and result must be calculated correctly." , "totalAmount: Invalid or missing field value. Field ‘items’ is required and result must be calculated correctly." , "timezone: Invalid field format. Must be formatted from -1100 to +1400." , "items: This field is required." , "items[0].order: Invalid field range. Must be between 0 to 999999999 only." , "items[0].quantity: Invalid field range. Must be between 0 to 999999999 only." , "items[0].amount: Invalid field value. Must be greater than 0.00" , "items[0].subTotal: Invalid or missing field value. Field ‘quantity’, ‘amount’ is required and must be calculated correctly." , "merchantReference: Invalid field format. Must be composed of letters, numbers, dot, dashes and hashtags only." ] }
docs.title: **RESTful Endpoints**

docs.text: This section describes every endpoint needed to integrate to E-Snapped API.
docs.title: RESTful Endpoints

docs.text: Connect and authenticate to the API to be able to commence a single transaction. POST/esws/api/connect Notes Issued authorization token is valid within 60 seconds upon response. Integrator must authenticate first before sending a transaction.
docs.title: Connect and authenticate to the API

docs.text: cURL curl -X POST "http://test.ws.e-snapped.com/esws/api/connect" -H "accept: application/json" -H "Key: test.esnapped.admin" -H "Secret: Qwerty1#$" -H "Content-Type: application/json"
docs.title: Request Samples

docs.text: 200 Successful Request 400 Result of missing/invalid header parameters 406 Result of incorrect authentication credentials. Please provide correct key and secret values
docs.title: Responses

docs.text: 200 { "code" : "OK.01" , "message" : "Authentication Success" , "timestamp" : "2017-09-11 16:11:13.735" , "token" : "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJBbHRQYXlOZXQgQ29ycCIsImlhdCI6MTUwMzY0MTQ0NiwiZXNrIjoiaUJHSXZLemx6N21EcXNEa1pLVmpiZyUzRCUzRC5lc3BqTEpTcWxDJTJGNGxuJTJGM2t2aSUyQmJGQnclM0QlM0QiLCJlc3AiOiIxdVIxQldGbnpiV2l4Zm1ITm92eUZ3JTNEJTNELmVzN3hjbk04cUJkdDF6NThEMTA1TTlKZyUzRCUzRCJ9.eF28MlgCtcPsK7rgqMD8xoaHysPb0cxgkEGwnOwoKh1" } 400 { "code" : "ER.01" , "message" : "HTTP Request Error" , "timestamp" : "2017-09-11 16:11:13.735" , "errors" : [ "Missing request header ‘secret’ of type String" ] } 406 { "code" : "ER.04" , "message" : "Validation Error" , "timestamp" : "2017-09-11 16:11:13.735" , "errors" : [ "Invalid credentials" ] }
docs.title: Response Samples

docs.text: Create invoice to the system that can be sent to the client through email. POST/esws/api/invoice/new Notes All decimal type fields must have 2 decimal places as default (e.g. 1.00 instead of 1 to avoid errors) All calculation results must be rounded up to 2 decimal places. If the tax rate has a value of exactly 0.00, then invoice tax details will not be shown.
docs.title: Generate Invoice

docs.text: cURL curl -X POST "http://test.ws.e-snapped.com/esws/api/invoice/new?s=true" -H "accept: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJBbHRQYXlOZXQgQ29ycCIsImlhdCI6MTU2NTIyOTM4OSwiZXNrIjoiSVNqYUVRTm9aWEpzenM4Z2lpciUyQmRBJTNEJTNELmVzRXFNd2g5Zk85a0xER0dMc2lraTJzUSUzRCUzRCIsImVzcCI6Ik56UTBOcWxUeks4cmxJblRxbGowWnclM0QlM0QuZXNpRTJkY2NFenE0OGxqNGZ1MGRvRmNRJTNEJTNEIiwiZXhwIjoxNTY1MjMxMTg5fQ.YImubUouh47RZvtEjRJN3g_8wpgSLUhzsrtr_wbV4fg" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{ "accountFName": "Abel", "accountLName": "Maclead", "companyName": "AltPayNet Corp.", "address1": "#88", "address2": "5 Boston Ave"", "cityMunicipality": "Philadelphia", "zip": 19132, "stateProvince": "PA", "countryCode": "US", "email": "amaclead@domain.com", "phone": "+99 999 999-9999", "mobile": "+99 999 999-9999", "items": [ { "order": 1, "item": "Sample item 1", "quantity": 1, "amount": 1000.99, "subTotal": 1000.99 } ], "totalAmount": 1000.99, "taxRate": 12.00, "taxDue": 120.12, "totalAmountDue": 1121.11, "dueDate": "2020-01-01", "currency": "USD", "notes": "Testing this invoice", "timezone": "+0800", "merchantReference": "INV-100001_TEST" }" Payload { "accountFName" : "Abel" , "accountLName" : "Maclead" , "companyName" : "AltPayNet Corp." , "address1" : "#88" , "address2" : "5 Boston Ave" , "cityMunicipality" : "Philadelphia" , "zip" : 19132 , "stateProvince" : "PA" , "countryCode" : "US" , "email" : "amaclead@domain.com" , "phone" : "+99 999 999-9999" , "mobile" : "+99 999 999-9999" , "items" :[ { "order" : 1 , "item" : "Sample item 1" , "quantity" : 1 , "amount" : 1000.99 , "subTotal" : 1000.99 } ], "totalAmount" : 1000.99 , "taxRate" : 12 , "taxDue" : 120.12 , "totalAmountDue" : 1121.11 , "dueDate" : "2020-01-01" , "currency" : "USD" , "notes" : "Testing this invoice" , "timezone" : "+0800" , "merchantReference" : "INV-100001_TEST" }
